catalog_script_client.name: Auto Fill Email Field

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_44de34ca4748711098f58977536d4369
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Newly Onboarded Employees' Details">110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto Fill Email Field</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() 
{
   var userEMail = (g_form.getValue('first_name_prac')).toLowerCase()+""+(g_form.getValue('mid_name_prac')).toLowerCase()+"_"(g_form.getValue('last_name_prac')).toLowerCase()+"@hcl.com";
	g_form.setValue('email',userEMail);
	g_form.addInfoMessage(getMessage('Please note the email address: '+userEMail));
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-16 18:14:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>44de34ca4748711098f58977536d4369</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Fill Email Field</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_44de34ca4748711098f58977536d4369</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-16 18:16:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
